name: Notion Crash Course
description: Become a Notion pro!This Notion crash course contains everything you need to know about Notion from setting up your Notion workspace to creating progress bars.This crash course is divided into 4 sections:Beginner Intermediate Advanced AestheticsOh and its free! Just enter "0" before checking out.How does it work?Pay what you feel is fair (enter "0" to get it for free) Complete the checkout process and you'll be redirected to the product pageBefore you click on the link make sure to give this pro
features: Intermediate; Pay what you feel is fair (enter "0" to get it for free); Complete the checkout process and you'll be redirected to the product page; Before you click on the link make sure to give this product a rating; Open the Notion link and click duplicate in the top right corner; Or you can just bookmark the link and use it like a website; Enjoy the course and play around with the Notion AI
